name: Invoice Report
query: select tabInvoices.invoice_date as 'Check Out Date', tabInvoices.name as 'Invoice Number',tabInvoices.guest_name as 'Guest Name',tabInvoices.confirmation_number as 'Confirmation No.',tabInvoices.gst_number as 'GST No.',tabInvoices.room_number as 'Room No.',tabInvoices.invoice_type as 'Invoice Type',tabInvoices.sales_amount_before_tax as 'Sales Amount',tabInvoices.cgst_amount as "Add CGST",tabInvoices.sgst_amount as "Add SGST",tabInvoices.igst_amount as "Add IGST",tabInvoices.total_gst_amount as "Total Gst Amount",tabInvoices.sales_amount_after_tax as "Invoice Total",tabInvoices.irn_generated as 'IRN Generated',tabInvoices.has_credit_items as 'Credit Invoice',tabInvoices.credit_irn_generated as "Credit IRN Generated",date(tabInvoices.creation) as 'Printed Date',date(tabInvoices.modified) as 'Last Modified Date',DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),DATE(tabInvoices.creation)) as "Pending For (day's)" from tabInvoices where (DATE(tabInvoices.creation) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s) order by tabInvoices.name, tabInvoices.room_number
